/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a breathtaking view of a mountainous landscape under a clear blue sky. The vantage point is high, providing a sweeping view of the valley below. Two roads carve their way through the terrain, one on each side of the frame. The road on the left, a winding path of gray, seems to be leading towards the heart of the mountains. In contrast, the road on the right, a straighter stretch of gray, seems to be heading towards the horizon. The sun, a radiant orb of light, shines brightly in the top right corner of the image, casting a warm glow over the scene. The image is taken from a low angle, making the viewer feel as if they are standing at the edge of the frame, looking out over the vast expanse. The overall composition of the image creates a sense of depth and scale, highlighting the grandeur of the natural landscape.
